name: Kitchen Hero(Prototype)
description:
This is a prototype of a mini-game made for the contest Rpg Maker Day Mini-game

https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/rpg-maker-day-mini-game-challen...

The intention here is to replicate the same mechanic from Overcooked to Rpg Maker Mv with na intention to use as a minigame ^^

Only have two stages.

Press Z to pick and drop items and execute actions.

1 - Cut the ingrediente;

2 -  pick up the plate and take the sliced ingrediente.

3 - Put it on the pan.

Repeat the process until is ready :)

Have fun!
